mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO CUSTOM ( MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_RRN, TRANSFER_DT, BANK, ACCT_NO, TRANSFER_RRN, TEL_NO, ADDR, POST_NO, REG_DT, CHG_DT, ITEM, PAYMENT, CANCEL_REASON, CLASSIFICATION, SALESPERSON, FIRST_TRANSFER_TURN, AFTER_DISCOUNT_TURN, CANCEL_FEE, SALES_ORG, PHONE_NO, MOVE_DT, MEMBER_GROUP, ETC ) VALUES
( #{item.memberNo}, #{item.memberName}, #{item.memberRrn}, #{item.transferDt}, #{item.bank}, #{item.acctNo}, #{item.transferRrn}, #{item.telNo}, #{item.addr}, #{item.postNo}, #{item.regDt}, #{item.chgDt}, #{item.item}, #{item.payment}, #{item.cancelReason}, #{item.classification}, #{item.salesPerson}, #{item.firstTransferTurn}, #{item.afterDiscountTurn}, #{item.cancelFee}, #{item.salesOrg}, #{item.phoneNo}, #{item.moveDt}, #{item.memberGroup}, #{item.etc} )
